wikipedia_page.main: Major  Chetwynd John Drake "Jock" Haswell (18 July 1919 – 21 January 2018), who also wrote as George Foster, was a British military and intelligence author and former British intelligence officer.  He was "Author for Service Intelligence" 1966–1984.

response: *George Foster, pen-name of Jock Haswell (1919–2018), British soldier, intelligence officer and author
